Query.Generic: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(sorder_no),0)+1 FROM sorder_header
Query.Ingres: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(sorder_no),0)+1 FROM sorder_header

Query.Generic: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(order_confirmation_id),0)+1 FROM order_confirmation
Query.Ingres: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(order_confirmation_id),0)+1 FROM order_confirmation

Query.Generic: SELECT MAX(ID) FROM pfd_web_sorder_seq
Query.Ingres: SELECT MAX(ID) FROM pfd_web_sorder_seq

Query.Generic: UPDATE pfd_web_sorder_seq SET ID = (ID + 1)
Query.Ingres: UPDATE pfd_web_sorder_seq SET ID = (ID + 1)

Query.Generic: UPDATE web_sorder_header SET Status='Delete' WHERE web_id=@OrderId
Query.Ingres: UPDATE web_sorder_header SET Status='Delete' WHERE web_id=@OrderId

Query.Generic: SELECT Status FROM web_sorder_header WHERE web_id=@OrderId
Query.Ingres: SELECT Status FROM web_sorder_header WHERE web_id=@OrderId

Query.Generic: SELECT wsh.* FROM web_sorder_header wsh INNER JOIN customer c on wsh.cust_code=c.cust_code INNER JOIN rep r on c.rep_code=r.rep_code WHERE order_date BETWEEN @StartDate AND @EndDate AND r.originator=@Originator
Query.Ingres: SELECT top 100 wsh.* FROM web_sorder_header wsh WHERE order_date BETWEEN '10/10/2012' AND '10/10/2017'

Query.Generic: SELECT web_id ,detail_changes_status ,sender_edi ,receiver_edi ,msg_ref ,order_response_no ,response_date ,date_required ,buyer_order_no ,promotional_deal_no ,buying_add_gs1_cd ,shipping_add_gs1_cd ,supplier_add_gs1_cd ,order_tot_amt ,tot_no_of_items ,as2_identifier FROM web_sorder_header WHERE detail_changes_status != 0 AND is_processed_by_web_svr = 0 AND is_acknowledgement_required=1
Query.Ingres: SELECT web_id ,detail_changes_status ,sender_edi ,receiver_edi ,msg_ref ,order_response_no ,response_date ,date_required ,buyer_order_no ,promotional_deal_no ,buying_add_gs1_cd ,shipping_add_gs1_cd ,supplier_add_gs1_cd ,order_tot_amt ,tot_no_of_items ,as2_identifier FROM web_sorder_header WHERE detail_changes_status != 0 AND is_processed_by_web_svr = 0 AND is_acknowledgement_required=1

Query.Generic: SELECT web_id, record_status, gtin_code, order_qty, unit_cost FROM web_sorder_detail WHERE web_id={0}
Query.Ingres: SELECT web_id, record_status, gtin_code, order_qty , unit_cost FROM web_sorder_detail WHERE web_id={0}

Query.Generic: SELECT * FROM web_sorder_detail WHERE web_id=@OrderId
Query.Ingres: SELECT * FROM web_sorder_detail WHERE web_id=@OrderId

Query.Generic: SELECT cust_code FROM customer WHERE e_peer_key=@BillToNumber
Query.Ingres: SELECT cust_code FROM customer WHERE e_peer_key=@BillToNumber

Query.Generic: DELETE from web_sorder_detail where web_id=@WebID
Query.Ingres: DELETE from web_sorder_detail where web_id=@WebID

Query.Generic: DELETE from web_sorder_header where web_id=@WebID
Query.Ingres: DELETE from web_sorder_header where web_id=@WebID

Query.Generic: UPDATE web_sorder_header SET is_processed_by_web_svr = 1 ,response_date = @ResponseDate WHERE web_id = @WebId
Query.Ingres: UPDATE web_sorder_header SET is_processed_by_web_svr = 1 ,response_date = @ResponseDate WHERE web_id = @WebId

Query.Generic: SELECT TOP 1 catlog_code FROM catalog WHERE tun_code = @BarCode AND catalog.browse_available = 'Y' AND catalog.del_flag != 'Y'
Query.Ingres: SELECT TOP 1 catlog_code FROM catalog WHERE tun_code = @BarCode AND catalog.browse_available = 'Y' AND catalog.del_flag != 'Y'

Query.Generic: SELECT TOP 1 catlog_code FROM catalog WHERE tun_code = @BarCode AND catalog.browse_available = 'Y' AND catalog.del_flag != 'Y'
Query.Ingres: SELECT TOP 1 catlog_code FROM catalog WHERE tun_code = @BarCode AND catalog.browse_available = 'Y' AND catalog.del_flag != 'Y'

Query.Generic: SELECT TOP 1 cust_code FROM customer WHERE ( Lower(name) LIKE '%bidfood%' OR Lower(name) LIKE '%bidvest%' ) AND cust_code = @CustCode
Query.Ingres: SELECT TOP 1 cust_code FROM customer WHERE ( Lower(name) LIKE '%bidfood%' OR Lower(name) LIKE '%bidvest%' ) AND cust_code = @CustCode

Query.Generic: SELECT as2_identifier, as2_mdn_url, certificate, certificate_type, as2_payload_type, as2_message_format FROM as2_communication_det WHERE as2_identifier= @identifier
Query.Ingres: SELECT as2_identifier, as2_mdn_url, certificate, certificate_type, as2_payload_type, as2_message_format FROM as2_communication_det WHERE as2_identifier= @identifier
